alert.note: Alert for Llano (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 10:33PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Llano County through 1115 PM CDT... At 1033 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Valley Spring to near Oxford. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kingsland, Llano, Buchanan Dam, Gainesville, Buchanan Lake Village, Castell, Field Creek, Lone Grove, Bluffton, Valley Spring, Baby Head, Prairie Mountain, Stolz, Oxford, Tow, and Inks Lake State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
